name: Dietary Order
description: Order message for dietary services including diet codes, supplements, and tray instructions
businessPurpose: Communicate dietary orders including diet specifications, supplements, and special tray instructions to food service systems
timing: Sent when dietary orders are placed, modified, or discontinued for patient meal planning
realWorldScenarios: Patient admitted requiring diabetic diet with low sodium supplement
Post-surgical patient transitioned from NPO to clear liquid diet
Allergic patient requiring dairy-free and gluten-free dietary restrictions
Cardiac patient ordered heart-healthy diet with fluid restriction
Pediatric patient requiring texture-modified diet due to swallowing difficulty
Discharge patient dietary order discontinued for meal service termination

generationRules.ODS.1: Diet type (e.g., REG, NPO, DAB, LNA)
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - accurate dietary orders critical for patient nutrition and medical compliance
